document_data.name: Move dune
document_data.mainbody: '''''Move dune''''' was a [[spell]] unique to [[Zakhara]], the Land of Fate.
document_data.Effects: This spell allowed the caster to lift and move a large heap of [[sand]], dust, or gravel. The spell was only able to move non-living matter. Stronger casters were able to move more material. If dropped, the matter created an effect similar to a [[sand shield|''sand shield'']].
document_data.Components: This spell required a pinch of sand to cast.
